name: BeTheKing
description:
A short demo video:

A game where you have to develop a comunity, and make them grow by ordering to your population what resources gather, building and conquering the enemy.

Early Alpha version.

Still working on a lot of stuff.

Some of things I'm working on:

Finishing first version of inventary

Adding resources gahered by npc to resources bar

Adding a few sets of clothes and armours

Adding a few enemies

Create minimap

Adding NPC tasks preference.

Etc etc...
